mapper.select: select com_cls, com_cnam from TB_CA510 where com_code = '00' and isnull(com_cls,'') Like concat('%',#{com_cls},'%') order by com_cls
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CA510 (com_cls, com_code, com_cnam ) values (#{com_cls}, '00', #{com_cnam})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CA510 SET com_cnam = #{com_cnam} where com_cls = #{com_cls} and com_code = '00'
